entry.title: Photos Post 12: XYZ Collection and Moments of Joy per Countries

link.title: Photos Post 12: XYZ Collection and Moments of Joy per Countries

entry.content:
Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs,

We are pleased to let you know that the XYZ Collection, also called the unnamed collection, has been completed. It has the largest number of galleries: 55. Moreover, it has 1,464 Photos (which is less than 6.26 percent of all Photos) and 87 photos Moments of Joy (which is less than 1.21 percent of all the photos Moments of Joy). We will continue to keep these percentages low and hopefully they will get even lower. Your help to identify the photographs of the Photos and photos from the XYZ Collection which are not yet credited to certain photographers would be greatly appreciated.
Direct link to the XYZ Collection: XYZ Collection

As another update, we have started adding Moments of Joy galleries to countries: we will go chronologically through all the 28 collections and collect their photos Moments of Joy in the corresponding galleries of countries. At the end of the process, the photos Moments of Joy will be displayed both chronologically and country-wise.

Please kindly share the news and the link with all our brothers and sisters.

Jay Śhrī Mātājī!

The Photo Subteam
entry.summary: Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs, We are pleased to let you know that the XYZ Collection, also called the unnamed collection, has been completed. It has the largest number of galleries: 55. Moreover, it has 1,464 Photos (which is less than 6.26 percent of all Photos) and 87 photos Moments of Joy (which is less than 1.21 percent of all the photos Moments of Joy). We will continue to keep these percentages low and hopefully they will get even lower. Your help to identify the photographs of the Photos and photos from the XYZ Collection which are not yet credited to certain photographers would be greatly appreciated. Direct link to the XYZ Collection: XYZ Collection As another update, we have started adding Moments of Joy galleries to countries: we will go chronologically through all the 28 collections and collect their photos Moments of Joy in the corresponding galleries of countries. At the end of the process, the photos Moments of Joy will be displayed both chronologically and country-wise. Please kindly share the news and the link with all our brothers and sisters. Jay Śhrī Mātājī! The Photo Subteam

entry.title: Photos Post 11: Special Events (after 1975), Part 05
entry.content:
Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs,

We are pleased to let you know that 2 Photos from the special event 1988-0000 Visiting the Hall of Prayer for Good Harvests, Beijing, China have been uploaded to Eternal Moments: 2 high resolutions from the Named Collections.
The direct link to the 2 Photos in the smaller gallery: China 1988.
Please kindly share the link with all our brothers and sisters.

Jay Śhrī Mātājī!

The Photo Subteam
sahajayoga.compilations@gmail.com
https://linktr.ee/comprehensivecompilationsteam

entry.title: Photos Post 9: Early Photographs (before 1976), Part 07
entry.content:
Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs,

We are pleased to let you know that 6 new Photos of the event 1975-1112 Hosting, IMCO Reception have been uploaded to Eternal Moments: 6 high resolutions from the Named Collections. They represent the earliest Photos from the UK so far on our records.
One direct link to all 6 Photos: UK 1975.
Please kindly share the link with all our brothers and sisters.

Jay Śhrī Mātājī!

The Photo Subteam
sahajayoga.compilations@gmail.com

entry.title: Photos Post 9: Early Photographs (before 1976), Part 06
entry.content:
Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs,

We are pleased to let you know that 1 new Photo of the event 1973-1200 Passport Photos has been uploaded to Eternal Moments: 1 medium resolution from the Named Collections. This is different from the multiple versions of a Photo from the same event, including three priorly uploaded, that have been shared over the years.
One direct link to all 4 Photos: Chronology 1973.
Please kindly share the link with all our brothers and sisters.

Jay Śhrī Mātājī!

The Photo Subteam

entry.title: Photos Post 11: Special Events (after 1975), Part 02
entry.content:
Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs,

We are pleased to let you know that 6 Photos and 1 photo Moments of Jy from the special events around the Honorary Knighthood of Sir C.P. such as 1990-0710 Family Photos, London, UK have been uploaded to Eternal Moments: 6 high resolutions from the Named Collections and 1 low resolution from unknown sources.
The direct link to all 6 Photos in the smaller gallery: UK 1990.
Please kindly share the link with all our brothers and sisters.

Jay Śhrī Mātājī!

entry.title: Photos Post 9: Early Photographs (before 1976), Part 04
entry.content:
Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs,

We are pleased to let you know that 8 Photos from the 1972-0409 Public Program, Dhule, Maharashtra, India, the first Public Program with an audio tape, have been uploaded to Eternal Moments: 4 high resolutions from the Named Collections and 4 low resolutions received from internet or unknown sources. Other Photos from internet sources with an imprinted caption "&copy Sahaja yoga memories" have been regarded as 'highly edited' and as such they have not been uploaded. If you know anyone involved in 'Sahaja yoga memories', please kindly put us in touch, as our subteam would be most happy to start a proper collection of unedited Photos in a Sahaja Yoga Memories Collection.
One direct link to all 8 Photos: Chronology 1972.
Please kindly share the link and our email sahajayoga.compilations@gmail.com with all our brothers and sisters.

Jay Śhrī Mātājī!

The Photo Subteam

Other Photos from internet sources with an imprinted caption "&copy Sahaja yoga memories" have been regarded as 'highly edited' and as such they have not been uploaded. If you know anyone involved in 'Sahaja yoga memories', please kindly put us in touch, as our subteam would be most happy to start a proper collection of unedited Photos in a Sahaja Yoga Memories Collection. One direct link to all 8 Photos: Chronology 1972. Please kindly share the link and our email sahajayoga.compilations@gmail.com with all our brothers and sisters.
